Name: The other side: My own horror
About the game: A small horror about a young man Stefan, whose life turns into a nightmare. Help him cope with the situation and understand what happened. You are expected by: - 10 levels - enemies who are not averse to feasting on you - riddles to be solved - items that are just waiting to be found - 2 endings - about 1 hour of gameplay - constant desire to wake up. Help Stefan get out of his nightmare, one way or another.
